mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of Ruffar Fort (Riffa Fort) at Riffa in Bahrain. The fort is located on raised ground along the horizon to the right of centre. Immediately before the fort and below the horizon to the left of the scene various mounds and earthworks can be seen. Some low-lying structures can be seen along the horizon to the left of the image.The foreground and middle-ground is made up of a stony plain.Inscriptions:Upper right, in pencil alongside image: 'a', '40'Below image, in pen: 'Ruffar Fort, Bahrein'
